00062     virtual uint32_t get_total_entries() {
00063       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00064       uint32_t total = 0;
00065       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00066         total += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_total_entries();
00067       return total;
00068     }
